meanings.definition: The action of denoting or indicating something.
meanings.sent1: The denotement of the map showed us where to go.
meanings.sent2: The denotement of the traffic light told us to stop.
meanings.sent3: The denotement of the cat's tail wagging wildly indicated it was happy.
meanings.sent4: The denotement of the storm clouds warned us of the impending rain.
meanings.sent5: The denotement of the teacher's raised hand meant it was time to be quiet.

meanings.definition: A sign or symbol that represents a specific meaning.
meanings.sent1: The ancient denotement on the cave wall told a story of hunters.
meanings.sent2: The red rose was a denotement of love and affection.
meanings.sent3: The denotement of the stop sign made the squirrel pause in its tracks.
meanings.sent4: The dove carrying an olive branch is a denotement of peace.
meanings.sent5: The denotement of the skull and crossbones warned of danger ahead.
